articles.name: How to Request a Refund from Discord
articles.title: How to Request a Refund from Discord
articles.body:
You can request a refund for your Discord subscription if it meets our Refund Policy requirements. Simply find your payment ID and submit your request to the Discord Billing Support Team.

What this article covers:
  • How to Find your Payment ID
    • Desktop/Browser
    • Mobile
  • How to Request a Refund
NOTE: Before requesting a refund, check out our Refund Policy to ensure your purchase is eligible.

How to Find your Payment ID

NOTE: You can only locate your payment ID within the desktop app or browser.

Before submitting a request for a refund, you’ll need to make sure you have the payment ID for the purchase that you’d like refunded. This helps us process your request quickly and ensure we refund the correct purchase.

Desktop/Browser

1. Head into your User Settings by pressing the cogwheel [] icon.

 

Cogwheel Icon on Desktop/Browser

2. Tap Billing, then select  the purchase for which you need the  payment ID.

3. The payment ID will appear in the dropdown menu. You can copy this ID and paste it into the support form.

Example of a Payment ID in the Billing tab of Discord’s User Settings

Mobile

NOTE: For any purchases (besides a Server Subscription) made on Discord using your iOS device, you will need to request a refund for those purchases via the iOS App Store. If you’re wanting to request a refund for a Server Subscription purchase, you can follow the steps below to obtain a payment ID.

In order to get your payment ID for a mobile purchase, please refer to the confirmation email you received with your purchase. This will include the payment ID.

For Android users, you can provide a payment ID, however, another option that provides a quicker turnaround is your GPA number from your Google Play Store confirmation email. If you’re unable to find your confirmation email from Google Play, you can check out their guide here on how to locate the GPA number.

If you can’t locate your confirmation email, you can obtain your payment ID through the desktop app or browser by following the steps above.

Confirmation email showing the Payment ID after making a purchase

How to Request a Refund

NOTE: Make sure when filling out the form you’re providing the email address that is tied to your Discord account.

1. Once you have your Payment ID, head to the Support form. 

2. Fill out each question in the form as it pertains to your billing request. Make sure to enter the Payment ID where requested.

3. After submitting your request you should receive a confirmation email letting you know your ticket has been received.

4. You will receive a response from the team once your ticket has been handled. 

NOTE: For any questions about refunds or billing matters, please contact the Discord Support team

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How can I request a refund for my Discord subscription?

A: You can request a refund by finding your payment ID and submitting a request to the Discord Billing Support Team. Make sure your request meets the Refund Policy requirements.

Q: What do I need before requesting a refund?

A: You need to:

  • Review the Discord Refund Policy to ensure your purchase is eligible
  • Have your payment ID ready
  • Use the email address associated with your Discord account

Q: How do I find my payment ID on desktop/browser?

1. Open User Settings via the cogwheel icon

2. Go to Billing and select the relevant purchase

3. Find the payment ID in the dropdown menu

Q: What if I made purchases on iOS or Android?

A: To request a refund from Apple, you will need to request a refund for those purchases via the iOS App Store.

 Android users need to provide the GPA number from their Google Play Store confirmation email instead of a payment ID. If you’re unable to find your confirmation email from Google Play, you can check out their guide here on how to locate the GPA number.

Q: What happens after I submit my refund request?

A: You'll receive:

  • An immediate confirmation email of your ticket submitted to our Support team
  • A response once your ticket has been processed

Q: What if I can’t find my payment ID?

A: If you can’t locate your payment ID in the Billing tab, you can obtain it from the confirmation email. If you still can’t locate it, please submit a request to the Discord Support team under the email address tied to your Discord account.

articles.name: Fortnite Quest
articles.title: Fortnite Quest
articles.body:
What this article covers:
  • Promotion Terms
  • How to Complete the Quest
  • Redemption Instructions
  • Frequently Asked Questions

Promotion Terms

Quest Game: Fortnite
Quest Name: Fortnite OG Quest

Offer Details: Play 15 minutes of Fortnite on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Xbox Series S to receive the Bush Camper avatar decoration. You can learn more about avatar decorations here. 

Who is Eligible: Available to players on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Xbox Series S, where both Discord and Fortnite are available. Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Availability Period: The Fortnite Quest can be accepted on Discord from December 6, 2024 until December 11, 2024 (11:59PM UTC). 

Quest requirements must be completed during this period to receive the reward. 

NOTE: The Bush Camper avatar decoration is a limited-time avatar decoration and will only be yours as an avatar decoration until February 11, 2025 (11:59PM UTC). After this date, you will no longer have access to this avatar decoration.    

Other Terms: Limit of one reward redemption per account.

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center. 

How to Complete the Quest

NOTE: To complete the Quest on PC, you must play Fortnite while running the Discord desktop app simultaneously.
If you decide to complete the Quest on console, the Quest tracking will begin as long as your Discord account is connected via console. For guidance on how to connect and complete the Fortnite Quest on console, you can refer to the following:
  • Discord and PlayStation® Network Connection FAQ
  • Discord and Xbox Connection FAQ

In order to successfully complete the Fortnite OG Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play Fortnite for a minimum duration of 15 minutes.

Redemption Instructions

Once you have completed the Quest by playing 15 minutes of Fortnite, you will receive a reward code in Quest Home (Discovery > Quests). You can participate in this Quest until December 11, 2024 (11:59 PM UTC) and claim your reward by January 11, 2025.

You can use the following methods to claim your avatar decoration:

Through the Quest Bar

To claim your Bush Camper avatar decoration, simply press the Claim Reward button in either the Quest bar.  

“Claim Reward” Button: Quest Bar 

Through the Quest Home

1. To claim your reward through Quest Home, head over to the Discover tab by selecting the Discover icon []  at the bottom of the server list on the left side of the app. 

2. This will direct you to the Discover page where you can explore available Discord Quests, by selecting the Quest tab within the Discover list. You can learn more about Discover here.

3. While here, select Claim Reward for the Fortnite Quest. 

“Claim Reward” Button: Quest Home

On Mobile

On mobile, select the Quest bar. This will bring you to the Quests tab where you can select Claim Reward. 

 

Mobile: Fortnite Quest Bar and “Claim Reward” Button in Quest Home

If you dismiss the mobile Quest bar, you can still find the Quest in Quest Home (Settings > Quests) to claim your reward. For more information about Quests on mobile, see this article.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can accept on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can accept one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account. 

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.
Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Q: Why am I unable to see Quests on the Discord mobile app?

A: This feature is only available on the desktop and browser app.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests. 

A: ​​We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests. 

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quests while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices. 

However, our team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows. 

Our support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home (Discover > Quests) or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

articles.body:
What this article covers:

Promotion Terms

Quest Game: Minecraft

NOTE: Minecraft Education is not eligible for this promotion. To complete the Minecraft Holiday Quest, the following Minecraft versions can be played: Java, Bedrock, and Windows.

Quest Name: Minecraft Holiday Quest

Offer Details: Play 15 minutes of Minecraft on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Xbox Series S and receive a Minecraft Skull Cloak.

NOTE: The Minecraft Skull Cloak can only be redeemed through Minecraft: Bedrock.    

Who is Eligible: Available on all platforms where Minecraft is available. 

Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for this Quest or reward.

Availability Period: The Minecraft Holiday Quest can be accepted on Discord from December 6, 2024 to December 20, 2024 (11:59PM UTC). 

Quest requirements must be completed during this period to receive the reward. Reward gift codes expire January 20, 2025.

Other Terms: 

Limit of one reward redemption per account.

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center. 

How to Complete the Quest

NOTE: To complete the Quest, you must play Minecraft on PC or console. If you decide to complete the Quest on PC, you will need to have the Discord desktop app running simultaneously.
If you decide to complete the Quest on console, the Quest tracking will begin as long as your Discord account is connected via console. For guidance on how to connect and complete the Minecraft Holiday Quest on console, you can refer to the following:
  • Discord and PlayStation® Network Connection FAQ
  • Discord and Xbox Connection FAQ

In order to successfully complete the Minecraft Holiday Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play Minecraft for a minimum duration of 15 minutes.

Redemption Instructions

1. After completing the Quest by playing Minecraft for 15 minutes, you'll receive a reward code in Quest Home (Discover > Quests). This code will also be sent to your Discord account's email address when you claim your reward.

You can participate in this Quest until December 20, 2024 (11:59 PM UTC) and must claim your reward by January 20, 2025.

2. To redeem your Minecraft Holiday Quest reward code, visit Minecraft’s code redemption website and log in to your account.

3. While there, scroll to find the module and paste your reward code to obtain your Minecraft Skull Cloak (redeemable only through Minecraft: Bedrock Edition).

Minecraft Skull Cloak Claim Window

On mobile, select the Quest bar. This will bring you to the Quests tab where you can select Claim Reward. 

   

Mobile: Minecraft Quest Bar and “Claim Reward” Button in Quest Home

If you dismiss the mobile Quest bar, you can still find the Quest in Quest Home (Settings > Quests) to claim your reward. For more information about Quests on mobile, see this article.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account. 

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.
Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.

Q: Why am I unable to see Quests on the Discord mobile app?

A: This feature is only available on the desktop and browser app.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests. 

A: ​​We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests. 

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices. 

However, our team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS. 

Our support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Gift Inventory or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

articles.name: The First Descendant Quest
articles.title: The First Descendant Quest
articles.body:
What this article covers:
  • Promotion Terms
  • How to Complete the Quest
  • Redemption Instructions
  • Frequently Asked Questions

Promotion Terms

Quest Video: Season 2: Void Chaser Main Trailer
Quest Name: The First Descendant Quest

Offer Details: Watch the Season 2: Void Chaser Main Trailer in Discord and unlock a Discord Collection Bundle!  

Availability Period: The First Descendant Quest can be accepted on Discord desktop app or browser client from December 6, 2024 until December 13, 2024 (6:00PM UTC). 

Quest requirements must be completed during this period to receive the reward.

Other Terms: Limit of one reward redemption per account.

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center. 

How to Complete the Quest

To fulfill the Quest requirement, the Season 2: Void Chaser Main Trailer must be watched through the Discord desktop app or browser client. 

In order to successfully complete The First Descendant Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must watch the trailer. 

1. Navigate to Quest Home (Discover [] > Quests) or hover over the Quest bar to find The First Descendant Quest.

The First Descendant Quest Bar and in Quest Home

2. Press Start Video Quest to launch the pop-up video player and watch the trailer. 

How to Start The First Descendant Quest via Quest Bar

NOTE: To play the video, you must use the Discord desktop app or browser client. The video will pause if you switch away from the Discord window. Don't worry if you can't finish the trailer in one sitting—your Quest progress is saved, so you can return to it later.

Redemption Instructions

Once you have finished watching the Season 2: Void Chaser Main Trailer, you'll be eligible to earn the Discord Collection Bundle. You can participate in this Quest until December 13, 2024 (6:00PM UTC) and claim your reward by December 31, 2024.

You claim your coupon code through the Quest bar, video player, or Quest Home:

Through the Quest Bar or Video Player

To claim your Discord Collection Bundle coupon code, simply press the Claim Reward button in either the Quest bar or the pop-up video player.  

  

“Claim Reward” Button: Quest Bar (Left) vs. Pop-up Video Player (Right)

Through the Quest Home

1. To claim your bundle through Quest Home, head over to the Discover tab by selecting the Discover icon []  at the bottom of the server list on the left side of the app. 

2. This will direct you to the Discover page where you can explore available Discord Quests, by selecting the Quest tab within the Discover list. You can learn more about Discover here.

3. While here, select Claim Reward for The First Descendant Quest. 

“Claim Reward” Button: Quest Home

Once you select Claim Reward, the reward code will also be sent to the email address associated with your Discord account. To receive the rewards, follow these steps in The First Descendant game.
To redeem in-game PC:
1. Access the game > Options > Account > Enter in the Enter Coupon option.
2. Enter the coupon code and press Confirm.
3. Access the mailbox in Albion to receive the item.
To redeem on the Coupons page PC & Consoles:
1. Enter The First Descendant’s Coupon page.
2. Enter your member code and coupon number to redeem the item.
3. Access the mailbox in Albion to receive the item after starting the game. The member code can be copied from the Game Menu > Options > Account > Member Code.
*The rewards will be available until December 31st at 23:59 (PT).

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account. 

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.
Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Q: Why am I unable to see Quests on the Discord mobile app?

A: This feature is only available on the desktop and browser app.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests. 

A: ​​We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests. 

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home (Discover > Quests) or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

articles.name: World of Warcraft x Mountain Dew Quest
articles.title: World of Warcraft x Mountain Dew Quest
articles.body:
What this article covers:
  • Promotion Terms
  • How to Complete the Quest
  • Redemption Instructions
  • Frequently Asked Questions

Promotion Terms

Quest Game: World of Warcraft
Quest Name: World of Warcraft x Mountain Dew Quest

Offer Details: Stream 15 minutes of World of Warcraft and receive a Crown of the Violet Rose!

Who is Eligible: Available to players in the US on where both Discord and World of Warcraft are available. Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Availability Period: The World of Warcraft x Mountain Dew Quest can be accepted on Discord from December 2, 2024 until December 9, 2024 (11:59PM UTC). 

Quest requirements must be completed during this period to receive the reward. Reward gift codes expire January 31, 2025. 

Other Terms: Limit of one reward redemption per account.

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center. 

How to Complete the Quest

To fulfill the Quest requirement, World of Warcraft must be played on PC and streamed through the Discord desktop app with at least one friend actively watching the stream. 

In order to successfully complete the World of Warcraft x Mountain Dew Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must live stream their World of Warcraft gameplay to a friend via a Discord voice channel for a minimum duration of 15 minutes on the desktop app. 

1. Before you can begin the Quest, launch the game.

2. Then, head to your Discord desktop app and navigate to a direct message (DM), group chat, or a  server of your choice.

3. Once there, start a voice call or join a voice channel and select the Screen Share [] icon located in the voice status panel. Be sure to select the individual application for the game before you Go Live. 

How to Share Your Screen with a Friend in a Voice Channel

NOTE: You must select the game application to stream! Streaming your device’s screen will not progress your Quest forward. Once you stream, you can check your progress on the Quest bar or via Quest Home (Discovery > Quests) to ensure progress is being made on the Quest.  

4. When you’re ready to stream your gameplay, press Go Live. You can learn more about streaming your game here. 

Redemption Instructions

1. Once you have completed the Quest by streaming 15 minutes of World of Warcraft, you will receive a reward code in Quest Home (Discovery > Quests). For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to our Discord Quests FAQ.

Once you select Claim Reward, the reward code will also be sent to the email address associated with your Discord account.

2. Then, navigate to the Battle.net desktop app and login into your account.

3. Once logged in, select your profile icon at the top-right corner of the app. 

4. While here, press Redeem Code and enter the redemption code to receive a Crown of the Violet Rose or claim your code using the Battle.net mobile app. 

For more World of Warcraft and other rewards, grab a specially marked package of Mountain Dew, and enter the code from the pack at www.mtndewgaming.com, and check out the massive marketplace of gaming rewards.

World of Warcraft x Mountain Dew Reward Claim Window

Frequently Asked Questions

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Q: Why am I unable to see Quests on the Discord mobile app?

A: This feature is only available on the desktop and browser app.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests. 

A: ​​We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests. 

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices. 

However, our team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows. 

Our support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home (Discover > Quests) or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

articles.name: PC Game Pass Quest
articles.title: PC Game Pass Quest
articles.body:
Notice as of December 2: We have fixed the error in app. Please make sure to fully refresh/restart your Discord app if you previously experienced an issue in your Quest Home.

What this article covers:
  • Promotion Terms
  • How to Complete the Quest

Promotion Terms

Quest requirements must be completed during this period to receive the reward.

Other Terms: The PC Game Pass trial is only available to new PC Game Pass members. 

Available in United States, Canada, Mexica, Brazil, United Kingdom, France, Germany, Australia, Japan, and Korea.  

A valid payment method is required, and there is a limit of one reward redemption per account. For details about the Microsoft Services Agreement, Game Pass terms, and system requirements, visit: xbox.com/subscriptionterms.
The reward codes are not “stackable” to previously redeemed trials. 

For information about Discord Quests and current active quests, visit the Discord Quest Help Center.

Once you select Claim Reward, the reward code will also be sent to the email address associated with your Discord account. To redeem your 14-day PC Game Pass trial code visit microsoft.com/redeem by December 31, 2024 (7:59 PM UTC).

Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Q: Why am I unable to see Quests on the Discord mobile app?

A: This feature is only available on the desktop and browser app.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests. 

A: ​​We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests. 

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home (Discover > Quests) or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

Q: I'm having trouble redeeming this code to my Microsoft account.

A: The PC Game Pass reward code is only available to new PC Game Pass members. Additionally, the reward codes are not “stackable” to previously redeemed trials. Therefore, if you do not meet this eligibility criteria, the code will not work.

However, this code can be gifted to a friend!

On the other hand, if you have meet the eligibility criteria and the code still does not work, contact the Xbox Support team directly to review this further through this link: https://support.xbox.com/contact-us 

Be sure to include the full details of the error, and screenshots to the Xbox Support team!

Q: I’m having trouble with my Microsoft account!

A: Please contact the Xbox support team at: https://support.xbox.com/contact-us

articles.name: Fortnite Quest
articles.title: Fortnite Quest
articles.body:
What this article covers:
    • Promotion Terms
    • How to Complete the Quest
    • Redemption Instructions
    • Frequently Asked Questions

Promotion Terms

Quest Game: Fortnite
Quest Name: Fortnite Quest

Offer Details: Play 15 minutes of Fortnite on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Xbox Series S to receive the Rift Butterfly Avatar Decoration. You can learn more about avatar decorations here. 

Who is Eligible: Available to players on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Xbox Series S, where both Discord and Fortnite are available. Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Availability Period: The Fortnite Quest can be accepted on Discord from November 29, 2024 until December 5, 2024 (11:59PM UTC). 

Quest requirements must be completed during this period to receive the reward. 

Note: The Rift Butterfly Avatar Decoration is a limited-time avatar decoration and will only be yours as an avatar decoration until. February 5, 2025 (11:59PM UTC).After this date, you will no longer have access to this avatar decoration.

Other Terms: Limit of one reward redemption per account.

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center. 

How to Complete the Quest

Note: To complete the Quest on PC, you must play Fortnite while running the Discord desktop app simultaneously. If you decide to complete the Quest on console, the Quest tracking will begin as long as your Discord account is connected via console. For guidance on how to connect and complete the Fortnite Quest on console, you can refer to the following:
  • Discord and PlayStation® Network Connection FAQ
  • Discord and Xbox Connection FAQ

In order to successfully complete the Fortnite Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play Fortnite for a minimum duration of 15 minutes.

Fortnite Gameplay

Redemption Instructions

Once you have completed the Quest by playing 15 minutes of Fortnite, you will receive a reward code in Quest Home (Discovery > Quests). You can participate in this Quest until December 5, 2024 (11:59 PM UTC) and claim your reward by January 5, 2025.

You can use the following methods to claim your avatar decoration:

Through the Quest Bar 

To claim your Rift Butterfly Avatar Decoration, simply press the Claim Reward button in either the Quest bar or the pop-up video player.  

Through the Quest Home

“Claim Reward” Button: Quest Bar

1. To claim your reward through Quest Home, head over to the Discover tab by selecting the Discover icon []  at the bottom of the server list on the left side of the app. 

2. This will direct you to the Discover page where you can explore available Discord Quests, by selecting the Quest tab within the Discover list. You can learn more about Discover here.

3. While here, select Claim Reward for the Fortnite Quest. 

“Claim Reward” Button: Quest Home

On Mobile

On mobile, select the Quest bar. This will bring you to the Quests tab where you can select Claim Reward. 

 

Mobile: Fortnite Quest Bar and “Claim Reward” Button in Quest Home

Note: If you dismiss the mobile Quest bar, you can still find the Quest in Quest Home (Settings > Quests) to claim your reward. For more information about Quests on mobile, see this article.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can accept on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can accept one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account. 

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.
Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. 

Q: Why am I unable to see Quests on the Discord mobile app?

A: This feature is only available on the desktop and browser app.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests. 

A: ​​We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests. 

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quests while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices. 

However, our team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows. 

Our support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home (Discover > Quests) or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

articles.name: WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium for Nitro Users
articles.title: WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium for Nitro Users
articles.body:
Note: This offer is available while supplies last.

Starting from December 5, 2024 (11:00AM PST) to December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST), Discord Nitro members can claim 1 month WEBTOON’s Monthly Coin Premium. Read more below about the promotion below.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium for Discord Nitro members.

Who is Eligible: To claim through Discord, you must be a current Nitro member. 

Requirements:

Claim through Discord Gift Inventory from December 5, 2024 (11:00AM PST) to December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST), and redeem in your WEBTOON account by December 31, 2025 (11:59PM PST).
Subscription:

After the 1 month free trial period, your WEBTOON subscription will convert to a monthly or yearly recurring subscription, and WEBTOON will bill your payment method unless you cancel the subscription.

What this article covers:
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is WEBTOON Coin Premium? 
  • How do I claim the WEBTOON membership in Discord? 
    • Eligibility for Claiming this Promotion in Discord
    • Step By Step Claim Instructions
  • How do I redeem the WEBTOON’s Monthly Coin Premium on my WEBTOON Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the WEBTOON
  • How do I share my Code with a Friend?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Claiming and Redemption Process
    • Potential Errors and Other Issue

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is WEBTOON Coin Premium?

WEBTOON is a global storytelling platform where a vibrant global community of creators and users discover, create and share incredible stories. WEBTOON pioneered the webcomic format, inspiring a new generation of creators and a cultural movement in visual storytelling. Home to some of the biggest creators, titles, and fandoms in webcomics, WEBTOON empowers anyone to share their story, build a global audience, and make money.

WEBTOON’S Monthly Coin Premium allows users to unlock exclusive pricing and enjoy episodes for less. 

How do I claim the WEBTOON’s Monthly Coin Premium in Discord?

As long as you're a Discord Nitro member, you'll be able to claim the WEBTOON’s Monthly Coin Premium code in the Gift Inventory from December 5, 2024 (11:00AM PST) to December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Eligibility for the Claiming this Promotion in Discord

In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active member to Discord Nitro, (and you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro member).

  • If you are an active Discord Nitro member, the code must be claimed in the Gift Inventory by December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST).
    • Otherwise, the code will not be available to claim after December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting member, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

Step By Step Claim Instructions 

1) Log into Your Discord account and head to the Gift Inventory tab. 

If you’re subscribed to Discord Nitro, start by logging into your Discord account. 

You may notice a notification bar at the top of your browser/desktop app, and you can press the "Take me there" button in the notification bar to be redirected to your Gift Inventory. 

For both the desktop/browser app and mobile app, you can also directly head to your User Settings, and then select Gift Inventory.

2) Click on the Claim button for the WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium Gift

Once you press Claim on the WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium Gift in the Gift Inventory and you'll then see a new pop-up with your 12 character code for this promotion.

If you want to redeem your code later, you can press the Maybe Later button, and then redeem the code before December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

How do I redeem the WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium Trial on my WEBTOON Account?

Once you have claimed the code in the Gift Inventory, you'll now need to officially redeem this code on your WEBTOON account (or share the link with a friend).

Eligibility for Redeeming the WEBTOON Trial

You will need a WEBTOON account without an active Monthly Coin Premium to be able to redeem the trial.

Note: If you're running into any issues when attempting to redeem this promotion, and you believe that your WEBTOON account meets the promotion requirements, you can reach out to WEBTOON’s support team here or to their support email: webtoonsupport@webtoon.com

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to claim this code on your own WEBTOON account, you'll be able to share this code with a friend to use instead.

To share the code, you can copy the provided link from your Gift Inventory (in your User Settings in the Discord app) which you should receive after tapping on Redeem. Then you can share the link to a friend in a Direct Message.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Claiming and Redemption Process
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion for Nitro members run for?

A: This promotion runs from December 5, 2024 (11:00AM PST) to December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

After December 25, 2024 (11:59PM PST), Nitro members will no longer be able to claim a trial code.

Q: How long does my WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium code last for in my Gift Inventory?

A: Once a code is claimed in the Gift Inventory in Discord, all WEBTOON codes must be redeemed by December 31, 2025 (11:59PM PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the WEBTOON account by December 31, 2025 (11:59PM PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to claim 1 month of WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion in the Discord Gift Inventory?

A: All current and new Nitro members are eligible for this perk. 

This does not include Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boost-only members.

Q: Who can redeem this WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium trial to their WEBTOON account?

A: The WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium trial can be redeemed on an account that does not currently have Monthly Coin Premium active.

Q: Can I redeem the WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium promotion to my WEBTOON account in my region? 

A: In order to redeem you’ll need to be accessing the English version of the WEBTOON app. If you need further support with your account, you can reach out to WEBTOON’s support team here or to their support email: webtoonsupport@webtoon.com.

Claiming and Redemption Process

Q: On which Discord platforms can I claim this promotion?

A: You'll be able to claim the promo on the mobile, browser and desktop version of the Discord app. 


Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem the WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium trial?

A: Because WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium is a subscription plan, at the end of your free 1 month trial, your first billing cycle starts so you can continue to enjoy WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium

However, you can cancel the WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium subscription at any time before the end of the 1 month.

If you need further support with your account, you can reach out to WEBTOON’s support team here or to their support email: webtoonsupport@webtoon.com.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I don't see the WEBTOON Monthly Coin Premium code in my Discord Gift Inventory? 

A: In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active member to Discord Nitro and you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro member.

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting member, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

If you are an active Discord Nitro member, make sure to refresh your Discord client to double check if an update was needed.

  • What if I'm still running into issues? 
    • If the refresh does not work, please submit a ticket through our support system at: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.
    • Be sure to submit the ticket using the email address associated with your Discord account, and send us a screenshot of the following: 
      1. Your My Account tab
      2. Your Gift Inventory tab

Q: I'm having trouble redeeming this promotion to my WEBTOON account. How do I contact WEBTOON’s support? 

A: If you are having issues redeeming this promotion on your WEBTOON account, you can reach out to WEBTOON’s support team here or to their support email: webtoonsupport@webtoon.com

articles.name: Batman: Arkham Shadow Quest
articles.title: Batman: Arkham Shadow Quest
articles.body:
What this article covers:
  • Promotion Terms
  • How to Complete the Quest
  • Redemption Instructions
  • Frequently Asked Questions

Promotion Terms

Quest Video: Batman: Arkham Shadow
Quest Name: Batman: Arkham Shadow Quest

Offer Details: Watch the Batman: Arkham Shadow Accolades trailer in Discord and unlock a Batarang avatar decoration! You can learn more about avatar decorations here. 

Availability Period: The Batman: Arkham Shadow Quest can be accepted on Discord desktop app or browser client from November 25, 2024 until December 8, 2024 (11:59PM UTC).

articles.name: In-game Features Powered by Discord FAQ
articles.title: In-game Features Powered by Discord FAQ
articles.body:
Discord is partnering with a limited number of game developers to enhance various social and communication features within their games. For players of these games, it means some aspects of their in-game experience (such as in-game voice or friends lists) will be powered by Discord.

Q: Does that mean I need a Discord account to play the game?

A: Players will not be required to connect a Discord account to play the game.

Q: Can I talk to my friends on Discord while playing this game?

A: In some games, players are able to chat with friends across Discord while they’re in-game, even if they’re not playing the same game.

Q: Will this integration affect my game performance?

A: The integrations are designed to avoid impacting game performance.

Q: Does this mean Discord can access all the messages I send in the game?

A: Discord is only able to access messages that the game developers provide access to, in accordance with the privacy policies of both Discord and the game.

Q: What can the game developer do with my data?

A: Refer to the privacy policies of Discord and of the game developer. Game developers are allowed to use messages to support their safety and content moderation efforts and as needed to power the communications experience between Discord and their game.

Note: If you’re running into an issue connecting your Discord account to your game, please reach out to the developer of that game for further assistance. Discord Support is not able to assist.

articles.name: Leaderboards FAQ
articles.title: Leaderboards FAQ
articles.body:
Leaderboards on Discord allows you to share your game/activity/app stats and compete with others in your server. Learn more about how to use Leaderboards in your Discord server!

What this article covers:
    • What Are Leaderboards?
    • How to View Leaderboards
    • How to Join Leaderboards
    • How Leaderboard Competition Works
    • Leaderboard Controls
      • How to Leave a Leaderboard
      • How to Customize Your Server’s Leaderboard

What Are Leaderboards?

Note: This is currently an experimental feature and is only available to a limited number of League of Legends players on desktop (Windows and Mac OS) and browser.

Leaderboards allow users to share their stats for a game, activity or application, and compete against other members in a server.

Leaderboards via the Desktop App

How to View Leaderboards

For servers in the experiment, a Leaderboard will appear on the Recent Activity section of the Member List. 

League of Legends Displayed as Activity Status in Members List

By hovering over the League of Legends activity in the Members List, you can view the Leaderboard for the server and see where everyone ranks.

Selecting a User in the Leaderboard

How to Join Leaderboards

In order to join Leaderboards, you will need to connect your League of Legends account to your Discord account. If you haven’t connected your League of Legends account already, there are two ways to do this.

Connecting Through the Leaderboard

1. With the Leaderboard opened, tap on Join Leaderboard at the bottom and then follow the prompts to connect your League of Legends account to Discord.

“Join Leaderboard” Button in the Leaderboard

Connecting in User Settings

1. Press on the cogwheel [] in the bottom-left corner to access your User Settings .

2. Select Connections and then choose League of Legends to connect your account.

Connections Tab within User Settings

3. After following the prompts, your League of Legends account will be connected to your Discord account. You can learn more about Connections through the Connections & Linked Roles: Community Members Help Center article. 

How Leaderboard Competition Works

Here's everything you need to know to participate and track your progress:

Viewing the Leaderboard
  • Find the leaderboard in the Recent Activity section of the server's members list.
  • Leaderboards are based on various League of Legends stats, including:
    • Wins
    • Kills
    • Damage taken
  • We may introduce additional stats in future updates.
Rank Updates
  • Your stats and rank updates automatically within 30 minutes after each match.
  • Discord fetches your latest match stats to keep the leaderboard current.
Rewards and Recognition
  • The #1 ranked player receives a special icon next to their name in the server.
  • Leaderboards reset weekly, giving everyone a fresh chance to compete.
Sharing Your Achievements
  • Want to showcase your rank? Simply copy a player's rank from the leaderboard.
  • Paste the rank in any text channel to share with the community.

Example of a User’s Ranking

Leaderboard Controls

How to Leave a Leaderboard

You can remove yourself from a server’s leaderboard by tapping on the ellipsis [] and  selecting Leave Leaderboard.

“Leave Leaderboard” Button

How to Customize Your Server’s Leaderboard

Members with the Manage Server permissions enabled can customize how the Leaderboard behaves in the server. 

Manager Server Permission 

1. With the Leaderboard opened, tap on the ellipsis [] and then select Manage Settings. 

Manage Settings Option in Leaderboards

2. There are two ways to customize the leaderboard:

  • Select a different stat as the basis for competition (e.g., kills, deaths, assists, damage taken or dealt, and wins).
  • Disable the role icon in chat.

Leaderboard Settings

articles.name: Best Buy x Discord Nitro Promo
articles.title: Best Buy x Discord Nitro Promo
articles.body:
Starting from November 6, 2024, Best Buy customers can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro from purchasing eligible Best Buy products. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

We will not be able to refund any leftover membership time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing membership when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is only available in the US and Puerto Rico where Discord Nitro and eligible Best Buy products are available. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim the promo by purchasing eligible Best Buy products starting November 6, 2024, and redeem it in your Discord account by December 5, 2025.

NOTE: This promo is only available to customers who have purchased Best Buy products with eligible SKUs. 

Membership: After the 1 month trial period, your Nitro membership will convert to a monthly recurring membership, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Best Buy?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Best Buy product?   
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Membership Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our membership plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Best Buy?

Best Buy is the world’s largest specialty consumer electronics retailer and provides its customers a unique mix of advice, products and services in Best Buy stores, on BestBuy.com and in homes. Expert associates advise customers on its curated assortment of the latest, name-brand technology, while its highly trained services teams help with designs, consultations, delivery, installation, tech support and repair.

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Best Buy product? 

To claim your Nitro promotion, simply purchase an eligible Best Buy product. 

  • For in-store purchases: Look for the Nitro offer code at the bottom of your receipt.
  • For online purchases: Check your email for the Nitro offer code.
NOTE: The Nitro offer code will be provided immediately after your purchase, regardless of whether you buy online or in-store. To receive your code via email, you must have opted into Best Buy's email communications.

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo on your Discord account. You must redeem this Nitro trial by December 5, 2025.

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

This promotion is only available in the US and Puerto Rico where Discord Nitro and eligible Best Buy products are available. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro membership on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

NOTE:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 2 - Claiming your promotion gift

Once you have logged in to your account, head over to your User Settings by selecting the cogwheel [] in the lower left corner. 

While there, select Gift Inventory. 

Then, enter the gift code in the Redeem Code box and press Redeem. You can find your unique gift code on the following: 

  • For in-store purchases: Look for the Nitro offer code at the bottom of your receipt.
  • For online purchases: Check your email for the Nitro offer code.

Afterwards, you will see a message appear below the box stating: “This looks like a promotion code. Click here to redeem.” Press Click here and follow the next prompts to redeem your Nitro promo trial. 

You can share this gift with a friend as long as the promo code has not been redeemed. Once the code is claimed, the account you are currently logged in as will receive this gift and it cannot be transferred to another user. Please ensure you are logged into the correct account before redeeming the gift or sharing the promo code with a friend.

Step 3 - Redeeming your promotion gift

Review the details of the promotion then press on Next. Please note: if you switch to a different account at this step, you will not be able to claim and redeem the promotion on the account you switched to. 

Make sure your payment information is accurate. If your Discord account does not have your payment information, please fill out your payment details. You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the membership renews.

When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the confirmation button.

Step 4 - Membership Now Activated

After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro membership on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Membership Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Best Buy Digital customers can purchase eligible Best Buy products starting on November 6, 2024, and redeem it in your Discord account by December 5, 2025. 

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by December 5, 2025.

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by December 5, 2025, it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion with their Best Buy purchase?

A: To redeem your Nitro promo, simply purchase an eligible Best Buy product. You will find the Nitro promo offer code on the following: 

  • For in-store purchases: Look for the Nitro offer code at the bottom of your receipt.
  • For online purchases: Check your email for the Nitro offer code.

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro membership on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro membership and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is only available in the US and Puerto Rico where Discord Nitro and eligible Best Buy products are available.This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost membership? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Payment Info and Membership Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a membership plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro membership at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

NOTE: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro membership so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account

Q: I see a "This gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "This gift has been claimed already" error, that means that the Nitro promo has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've claimed this promo on another Discord account.

Unfortunately, once the promo has been claimed, the promo cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the promo is invalid.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if you are given an invalid promo and we will not be able to provide a new promo.

Q: I see a “Looks like something went wrong” error when I click on “Next”.

A: There are several reasons why you may be seeing this error:

  • You are ineligible for this promotion
  • The promotion is invalid
  • The promotion has reached the maximum number of claims
  • The link is invalid

Please note that the Discord support team is not able to assist if you run into this error when attempting to redeem. See the list above for possible reasons why your account may be ineligible or otherwise unable to redeem this promotion.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a “Looks like your email isn’t verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.”

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like your email isn’t verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift” error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn’t been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article. 

Q: What should I do if I'm experiencing issues with my Best Buy purchase?

A: Log into your MyBBY account to resend the redemption email or press "Redeem Now." If you need further assistance, contact Best Buy support at 1-888-BESTBUY (1-888-237-8289).

articles.name: HD Splash Potion FAQ
articles.title: HD Splash Potion FAQ
articles.body:
HD Splash Potion allows everyone in a voice channel to enjoy HD video streaming quality for the next 12 hours without Nitro and Server Boosts.

What this article covers:
  • What is the HD Splash Potion?
  • Why and when should I use an HD Splash Potion?
  • How do I activate and use my HD Splash Potion?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
HD Splash Potions are currently an experimental feature, available only to select desktop users.

What is the HD Splash Potion?

Why, adventurer, you may have stumbled into a curious, new trinket on Discord…

The HD Splash Potion is a new feature that grants the magical properties of crystal-clear HD streaming quality on Discord.

With a single use, you and everyone in a designated voice channel can enjoy crystal-clear HD streaming quality for the next 12 hours - without anyone needing an active Nitro subscription or Server Boosts.

Example of Using an HD Splash Potion 

NOTE: Potion availability and streaming quality may be impacted by the device conditions of participants in the channel.

Why and when should I use the HD Splash Potion?

The HD Splash Potion is perfect for any moment where you and your friends want to enjoy crystal-clear HD streaming quality together at the same time, even when you don’t have server boosts or an active Nitro subscription.

Whether you’re gaming together, hosting a watch-and-hangout session, or studying with others, some examples of popular situations to sip your HD Splash potion could include:

  • Group gaming sessions
  • Watch parties
  • Group gatherings and hangouts
  • Community events like music, art, and talent shows
  • Study sessions and presentations

How do I activate and use my HD Splash Potion?

You and your friends can enjoy enhanced streaming quality by following these steps:
1. In a voice channel, select the Screen Share [] icon.

Share Your Screen Button in Voice Channel

2. In the Screen Share pop out, locate and select your HD Splash Potion. This channel will become your designated space where your entire squad can enjoy streaming in HD quality together.
Choose a voice channel carefully. The potion’s HD splash effect can’t be moved to a different channel once after it’s activated.

Selecting the HD Splash Potion in Screen Share Menu

3. Once you’re certain of the voice channel, be sure to confirm.

HD Splash Potion Voice Channel Selection and Confirmation: Your first HD Splash Potion is free on us! Afterwards, you can purchase more potions as needed. 

And that’s it! You’ll know you and your squad are enjoying HD streaming quality once you see the HD tag over your streams.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What platforms is the HD Splash Potion available on?

A: Currently, it’s only available on desktop devices.

Q: How much do HD Splash Potions cost?

A: Your first HD Splash Potion is free so you can try it out to see if you like it. After using your free potion, additional HD Splash Potions can be purchased for $0.99 USD each.

Q: Do I need Nitro or server boosts to use an HD Splash Potion?

A: Nope! The HD Splash Potion grants HD streaming quality in a designated channel for a set period of time—for you, your friends, and other server members who have access to that voice channel. No Nitro or server boosts required!

Q: How long does the HD Splash Potion last?

A: Once used, the HD Splash Potion will grant 12 hours of HD streaming quality in the channel where it was activated. Anyone who joins the designated channel will enjoy HD streaming until the potion’s effect expires.

You can still control your streaming quality at any time. For instance, if you notice your device’s performance struggling, you can adjust the streaming quality in the Share Your Screen pop out.

Q: Does everyone in the channel need to have or use a HD Splash Potion to enjoy HD streaming quality?

A: Nope! Just one person needs to use their potion in a designated channel to grant everyone in that channel the ability to benefit from HD streaming quality.

Q: Do I need to be friends with the potion user to receive HD streaming from the potion?

A: Not at all! Once someone uses their HD Splash potion in a channel, anyone can enjoy HD streaming quality in that designated channel, regardless of friendship status.

Q: What happens when the 12 hours are up?

A: Once the time is up, HD streaming quality in the designated channel will return to its standard quality for anyone without an active Nitro subscription.

Q: Can I move the HD Splash effect from my potion to a different channel after I’ve activated it in one channel?

A: Nope. The HD Splash potion will only grant its effect in the channel where it was used. Choose the voice channel carefully before activating the potion.

Q: What’s your refund policy for the HD Splash Potion?

A: Potions are non-refundable—we’re unable to refund potions after purchase or use.

Q: What happens if a person with low bandwidth is watching my HD Splash Potion stream?

A: The effect of the HD Splash Potion can be impacted by the technical limitations of your or your fellow streamers' device or bandwidth. HD streaming capability may be limited if people watching your stream have low bandwidth or are tuning in from an unsupported device. To ensure that everyone in the call can benefit from the HD Splash Potion, make sure everyone in the call has a strong internet connection and is watching from a desktop device.

articles.name: Halloween Event 2024 FAQ
articles.title: Halloween Event 2024 FAQ
articles.body:
NOTE: This sound pack is available on desktop and browser only. This event was sadly too eerie for iOS and Android at this time. 👻

Another year - another ghostly Halloween! We’ll be exchanging our normal Discord call tone for something eerier. So grab a fiend or friend and give them a call, or have them call you! Lookout for more eerie sound effects throughout as well! 

Frequently Asked Questions

A: The Halloween sound pack will be available from October 24, 2024 - November 3, 2024. 

Q: Where can I enable this sound pack? 

A: The Halloween sound pack should be available automatically at 10:00AM PST. 

If you've disabled the Halloween sound pack, you can re-enable it. Go to User Settings > Notifications. Then select Halloween from the Event Sound Pack dropdown menu.

Halloween Event Sound Pack in Notifications Settings

How to Revert Event Sound Pack to Discord Default in Notifications Settings
